customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
first.
Quest Objective: Look for the strange light orb
Go near the box and use the Kuuvahki (it will also start the quest if the quest hasnâ€™t been started already).
Go after the glowing orb.
Get on top of the glowing box and jump and use the Kuuvahki to open the room where it goes too. Go in and jump in the area below.
Use the Kuuvahki to grab the ID Card and align it with the 3 seals to break the ward.

Quest Objective: Defeat all opponents
Quest Objective: Investigate the nearby area
Defeat the opponent that appears near the chest and then interact with the box the glowing orb goes to.
Then, use the Kuuvahki to move the two rocks near the glowing orb

Quest Objective: Follow the strange light orb
Go after the glowing orb
Each time the orb stops in front of walls, use the Kuuvahki on each wall to remove it

Quest Objective: Shoot down the bots
Use the Kuuvahki button near the bot to destroy it.
To go near the bot for the button to appear, the player must stand on one of the platforms and jump. When the player is near the device, they must use the Kuuvahki.
Quest Objective: Follow the strange light orb
